posts.cooked: Why is this specific date special?

posts.name: Navneet Vikram Tey
posts.cooked: That is American Independence Day , I think the person meant as in Signal is American based company so they might? I don‚Äôt see it happening that fast but sure xD
Well, good to know. Never heard of that date as an European. Thank you for the explanation

I thought everybody in Europe know the meaning of the date for Americans since virtually everybody have seen Independence Day. It was so popular movie. then I remembered it was released in 1996. I feel old.

posts.name: Jeremy
posts.cooked: Probably because we fought against the UK for our freedom

posts.name: üëäüá∫üá∏üî•
posts.cooked: I was 8 when I saw it. That alien autopsy scene haunted me for a long time.

posts.name: Meteor0id
posts.cooked: Bit weird to put emphasis on your American pride if you have international aspirations.

posts.name: üëäüá∫üá∏üî•
posts.cooked: Going back to the Independence Day movie. It was called Independence Day because the world came together to fight for their independence against an invading alien force. I‚Äôd imagine, if July 4th were the release date for usernames, it would be more of a celebration of global data independence than American nationalism/independence from England.
Independence from phone numbers?

Would we actually get complete independence?

Seems like the govt will insist on some passport and then give you any id you want for you to use inside their country.
can wait to spam my username around the world and to chat with strangers without reveal my phone number

Maybe I am just too jung for that film. I somehow recognize the title but never thought about the reason of that title.

I‚Äôd call it independece of my phone number to a US company and their ‚Äúwe are allowed to look into your user‚Äôs personal data‚Äù laws. Greate for everybody .

Big assumption. Many people dont know a lot about usa.
Personally, i havnt seen the movie.

posts.name: Ponytail
posts.cooked:
4th July is tomorrow.
Last message in the beta thread (for android) by any dev was 2 days ago. v5.15.6 is no longer in beta.
So, maybe tomorrow, you know. Wink*wink

posts.name: anise
posts.cooked: don‚Äôt sleep tonight. be excited

posts.name: Salt
posts.cooked:
ponytail:

Last message in the beta thread (for android) by any dev was 2 days ago

Not to burst your bubble, but Signal devs rarely ever respond on weekends. They also never release new builds on the weekend, so I‚Äôd be surprised if we see anything released tomorrow.

It‚Äôs still a possibility, but don‚Äôt get too excited

posts.name: Ponytail
posts.cooked: I‚Äôm not expecting anything besides a new beta release. I will e surprised and super happy is usernames (or a derivative of that) are announced.

do you think it will be the username linked to the phone number? I explain better, for the server (and for third parties: law enforcement, hackers attacks‚Ä¶) given a username you can trace the phone number associated with it?

posts.name: anise
posts.cooked: It will be linked with UUID
